result.title: Address Whitelist
result.name: address_whitelist
result.description: Address / domains that should never have email suppressed.

result.title: BCC
result.name: bcc
result.description: Automatically BCC an address for every e-mail sent.

result.title: Bounce Purge
result.name: bounce_purge
result.description: Allows you to automatically purge bounce records from SendGrid after a specified number of days.

result.title: Event Notification
result.name: event_notify
result.description: Controls notifications for events, such as bounces, clicks, and opens.

result.title: Footer
result.name: footer
result.description: Allows you to add a custom footer to outgoing email.

result.title: Forward Bounce
result.name: forward_bounce
result.description: Allows you to forward bounces to a specific email address.

result.title: Forward Spam
result.name: forward_spam
result.description: Allows for a copy of spam reports to be forwarded to an email address.

result.title: Legacy Email Template
result.name: template
result.description: Allows you to customize your outgoing HTML emails.

result.title: Plain Content
result.name: plain_content
result.description: Convert your plain text emails to HTML.

result.title: Spam Checker
result.name: spam_check
result.description: Check outbound messages for spam content.
